name: Fast Fixin' Chocolate Chip Cake
author: Sister Dorothy Reinhold

ingredients.name: (18.25 oz.) box devil's food cake mix
(4 serving size) pkg. chocolate instant pudding mix

instructions:
Preheat oven to 350Â°. You don't need bowl. Pour oil into a 13 x 9 x 2 inch pan. Tilt pan until bottom is covered with oil. Put cake mix, eggs, water, pudding mix, and chocolate chips into pan; stir with a fork or spoon until blended, about 2 minutes. Scrape sides; spread batter evenly in pan. Bake 35 to 45 minutes, until tooth pick inserted near center comes out clean. Cooled cake may be sprinkled with pow- dered sugar. Use a knife to loosen cake from sides; cut and serve directly from pan. Store leftover cake loosely covered.
Variation: Prepare pan as directed, using 1/4 cup oil. Add cake mix, 2 eggs, 1/2 cup water and 1 (20 to 23 ounce) can cherry pie filling. Mix, bake, and serve.
